# This is a list of files to be uploaded to the ashlar or wordpress cdn.  The file is used by gulp and the paths are relative to the ashlar directory. 
# If the path contains a pipe (|) sign, that indicates that the path under ashlar differs from the path on the CDN and the Jenkins script that uses
# this file will copy the file found at the location indcated by the path before the pipe to the path found after the pipe sign.
# For instance, if the first uncommented line read 'build/css/alerts.css|dist/css/alerts.css', the script would look for build/css/alerts.css and copy it to 
# dist/css/alerts.css on the CDN.
# Alex W.  
css/alerts.css
css/ashlar-base.css
css/normalize.css
fonts/Atkinson-Hyperlegible-Bold-102a.woff2
fonts/Atkinson-Hyperlegible-BoldItalic-102a.woff2
fonts/Atkinson-Hyperlegible-Italic-102a.woff2
fonts/Atkinson-Hyperlegible-Regular-102a.woff2
fonts/OpenDyslexic3-Regular.woff2
fonts/fira-sans-extra-condensed-300.woff2
fonts/fira-sans-extra-condensed-400.woff2
fonts/fira-sans-italic.woff2
fonts/fira-sans-light-italic.woff2
fonts/fira-sans-normal-300.woff2
fonts/fira-sans-normal-400.woff2
fonts/fira-sans-normal-600.woff2
fonts/fira-sans-normal-700.woff2
fonts/fira-sans-normal-900.woff2
fonts/material-icons.woff2
fonts/montserrat-700.woff2
fonts/montserrat-900.woff2
fonts/pt-serif-400.woff2
fonts/pt-serif-700.woff2
js/logo.js
js/pre-header.js
js/search.js
js/wwu-footer.js
js/wwu-header.js
css/components/accordion.css
css/components/announcement.css
css/components/banner.css
css/components/beyond-basics-blocks.css
css/components/countdown.css

css/components/pre-header.css

css/components/search.css
